      • isDestroySessionsOnShutdown

        public abstract boolean isDestroySessionsOnShutdown()
                                             throws ConnectorException
        Abstract method to indicate whether existing user sessions should be destroyed upon shutdown. It is guaranteed that attempting to resume a previously created session after a restart will fail, if indicated; however, it is not guaranteed that previously created sessions will remain valid.
        Returns:
        true if sessions to be destroyed
        Throws:
        ConnectorException

      • getUserAttributes

        public java.util.Set<ConnectorAuth.UserAttribute> getUserAttributes()
                                                             throws ConnectorException
        Returns the set of expected available attributes for a user
        Returns:
        by default includes username and email address
        Throws:
        ConnectorException
